      void setBuffer(byte[] buffer)
      public byte[] readBytesReverse(int amount, ValueType type) { byte[] data = new byte[amount]; int dataPosition = 0; for (int i = buffer.position() + amount - 1; i >= buffer.position(); i--) { int value = buffer.get(i); switch (type) { case A: value -= 128; break; case C: value = -value; break; case S: value = 128 - value; break; } data[dataPosition++] = (byte) value; } return data; }
      void setChannelBuffer(org.jboss.netty.buffer.ChannelBuffer channelBuffer)

        public byte[] readBytesReverse(int amount, ValueType type) { byte[] data = new byte[amount]; int dataPosition = 0; for (int i = buffer.position() + amount - 1; i >= buffer.position(); i--) { int value = buffer.get(i); switch (type) { case A: value -= 128; break; case C: value = -value; break; case S: value = 128 - value; break; } data[dataPosition++] = (byte) value; } return data; }
